pullrequest.title: Add tests for Euler angle singularities

content.raw:
Carlos,

The test shouldn't pass, at the moment, as there's a problem with the Euler angle conversion function in the presence of singularities.  Here's the original discussion that lead to the creation of this test:

https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/2023/singularities-in-euler-angles

There is a fix (starts on page 4):

http://www.staff.city.ac.uk/~sbbh653/publications/euler.pdf

which I'd be happy to implement unless you already have something else in mind.
